name: ClotchSongs
0:
”Alexa, open my streamer”
”Alexa, ask my streamer for free features”
”help”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my streamer
des:
Stay on top of your mindfulness with Clotch Songs, the ultimate app designed to help you never miss a beat. It ensures you receive timely reminders, so you can focus on feeling your best.

Key Features:

Reminder: Get notified via mobile SMS, push notifications, and your Alexa Echo device when it's time for Clotch Songs.

Customizable Alerts: Set personalized reminders based on your preferences.

Easy Tracking: Keep track of all your clotch songs in one place with our user-friendly interface.

Voice Integration: Simply ask Alexa to check your scheduler or set a new reminder.

Secure and Private: Your information is stored securely and is only accessible to you.
With Clotch Songs, managing your clotch songs has never been easier. Stay organized, stay healthy, and let Clotch Songs handle the rest.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
